title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

accession.description: The accession is the unique identifier of a MassBank record. The accession follows the format '[A-Z0–9_]{1,32}-[A-Z0–9_]{1,128}'. The first 1-32 letters are assigned by MassBank and the remaining 1-128 letters are assigned by the contributor. All accession in MassBank start with 'MSBNK_', but thats not a requirement of the format.
accession.title: The accession of the record
